location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5987/45 'Proposed visit of Persian Finance Ministry representative to India'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a single telegram regarding the proposed visit of Persian Ministry of Finance representative to the Government of India.
